channel.title: Decolonize the future on Futurecon 2021
channel.description: Recent content in Decolonize the future on Futurecon 2021

item.title: Support FUTURE·CON▸
item.description: Futurecon is free. It will generate no profit or revenue whatsoever. However, contributions are more than welcome! You can donate $10 or as much as you can to help us cover expenses.
